column1: Cost per message in USD on the WhatsApp Business Platform, effective July 1, 2025 - Reflecting volume tiers
This is not our current rate card. This reflects future updates to rates. Please refer here for our current rates: https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing#rate-cards
Please refer here for more detail on our volume tiers, effective July 1, 2025: https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/updates-to-pricing#volume-tiers
